row.notes: Combination合 of destinies縁 and strange奇 fate縁 bringing people together
row.jpn: ふしぎな巡り合わせの縁。

row.english: The pain of separation from a loved one
row.notes: Separated別 from a loved愛 one and the trauma苦 of that separation離
row.jpn: 別れのつらさをいう。

row.notes: 青息・吐息 both mean to sign dejectedly
row.jpn: 非常に困った苦しんだりするときに発するため息。

row.notes: 悪・苦=hard, tough; 戦・闘=battle
row.jpn: 困難を乗りこえようと非常な努力をすること。

row.english: Never betray your morals, no matter how desperate
row.notes: Do not take shade under an evil悪 tree木 or drink from a stolen盗 spring泉; From 「渇すれども盗泉の水を飲まず、熱けれども悪木の陰に息わず。」
row.jpn: 悪事に染まるものを戒める語。また、悪事に染まること。

row.notes: Dark暗 clouds雲 hanging low低迷
row.jpn: 前途不安な状態が続くこと。

row.notes: Leaping躍 and flying飛 in中 darkness暗
row.jpn: 人知れずひそかに活躍すること。

row.english: Content to not rock the boat
row.notes: At peace安 with your lot分 in life and protecting守 yourself己
row.jpn: 身のほどをわきまえて生きること。

row.notes: Weak薄弱 of will意志
row.jpn: 自分の明確な意志をもたないさま。

row.english: Pouring your heart and soul into something
row.notes: Fighting攻 a tough苦 battle with singular一 intention意
row.jpn: ひとすじに考え込むこと。

row.english: Everyone has their own interpretation of Buddhism
row.notes: One一 moon月 three三 boats舟; Viewed from a still boat the moon appears to stand still, viewed from a boat moving north the moon appears to move north, viewed from a boat moving south the moon appears to move south
row.jpn: 仏道は一つであるのに人のさまざまな受け取り方で種々別々の意味にとられるたとえ。

row.notes: Unified一元 expression描写 using only first-person experience in narrative, championed by Iwano Homei (岩野泡鳴) among others
row.jpn: 小説の作中人物を主人公の視点からのみ一元的に描写すべきであるとする小説作法。

row.notes: A一 tribe族 and its retainers郎党
row.jpn: 血縁関係にある者とその従者や家臣。

row.notes: One一 read読, 3三 cries嘆 of emotion
row.jpn: 名文を読んで感銘すること。

row.notes: Single一minded念 awakening発起; Originally referring to spiturally awakening and the resolution to achieve Nirvana
row.syn: 一念発心,一心発起,感奮興起
row.jpn: あることを成し遂げようと決意すること。

row.english: 'Strenous efforts, unless sustained, are to no avail' - Mencius (孟子)
row.notes: Many an effort starts with one一 day of warmth暴 (action) followed by 10十 days of cold寒 (inaction)
row.jpn: 努力が少なく怠ることが多いのを戒めた語。

row.notes: One一 punishment罰 serves to warn戒 100百 people
row.jpn: 一人の過失や罪を罰することで、他の人々が同様な罪を犯さないよう戒めること。

row.kun: 一(ひと)つの網(あみ)で打(う)ち尽(つ)くす
row.notes: Hitting打 all尽 with one一 net網
row.jpn: ひとまとめに悪人を捕らえ尽くすたとえ。

row.notes: Not不 willing to remove抜 a single一 hair毛, i.e., unwilling to invest any energy even if success is all but guaranteed
row.jpn: 物惜しみのはなはだしいこと

row.english: From a single grain grows a great harvest
row.notes: One一 grain粒 producing 10,000万 times倍 its worth in harvest
row.jpn: わずかなものから多くの利益を得るたとえ。

row.english: Speak with forked tongue; Speak out both sides of your mouth
row.notes: One一 mouth口, dual両 tongues舌
row.jpn: 前に言った内容とくい違うことを平気で言うこと。

row.notes: All一切 things that have有 feeling情
row.jpn: この世の生あるもの全て。

row.english: The whole kit and kaboodle; Everything but the kitchen sink
row.notes: 一切・合切 both mean everything
row.jpn: 何もかも全て。

row.notes: A一 smile笑 worth 1000千 gold金
row.jpn: ひとたびほほえめば千金に値するほどの美人をいう。

row.english: It is the blood of the soldiers that makes the general great
row.notes: The一 general's将 success is built on 10,000万 soldiers' bones骨
row.syn: 一将功成りて万骨枯る
row.jpn: 上に立つ者だけに功名が与えられ、部下は犠牲にされることのたとえ。

row.notes: One一 touch触 and it immediately即 explodes発
row.jpn: 非常に緊迫した状況にさらされていること。

row.notes: Single一 minded心 resolution発起. ※発起＝ほっき, originally Buddhist term for aspiration
row.jpn: あることを成し遂げようと決意すること。

row.notes: 寸 is a small unit of length, 光陰 represents day光 and night陰, i.e., passage of time
row.jpn: ほんのわずかな時間のこと。

row.notes: Sincerely from my small一寸 red丹 heart心. 寸 is a small unit of length
row.jpn: うそいつわりのないまごころ。自分のまごころを謙遜していう語。

row.english: A single day; A brief span of time
row.notes: One一 morning朝, one一 evening夕. Used to indicate too little time, e.g. 一朝一夕にはできない
row.jpn: ほんのわずかな期間。非常に短い時間のたとえ。

row.notes: Leader of everything under the one一 sky天 and 10,000万 chariots乗 (counter for army chariots)
row.jpn: 天下を治める天子の意。

row.reading: いっぺんのひょうしん
row.notes: Clear as a一 shard片 of ice氷 is your heart心
row.jpn: 清く澄みきった心境のこと。

row.notes: Shift移 customs風 and change易 the culture俗
row.jpn: 風俗をよい方へ移し変えること。

row.notes: Remaining遺 customs風 linger残 like a frangrance香
row.jpn: 昔の優れた人や風俗のなごり。

row.notes: 威風=imposing; 堂堂=splendor
row.jpn: 威厳に満ち溢れてりっぱなこと。威厳が大いに盛んなこと。

row.english: Governing with equal importance placed on culture and military
row.notes: Military武 and culture文 woven together like horizontal緯 and vertical経 threads in a cloth
row.jpn: 文武両道を重んじて国を治めること。

row.notes: Drinking飲 ash灰 to cleanse洗 your stomach胃
row.jpn: 前非を悔い改め再出発すること。

row.english: A charitable deed done in secret will be rewarded openly
row.notes: Unseen陰 benevolence徳 brings visible陽 reward報; 陰陽 are Yin&Yang
row.jpn: 人知れずよい事をする者には、必ずはっきりしたよい報いがあるということ。

row.notes: Yin陰&Yang陽 and the Five五 Elements行, water, fire, wood, metal and earth.
row.jpn: 天地間の万物を造り出す陰・陽の二気と、天地の間に循環して万物を生じるもととなる水・火・木・金・土の五元素。

row.notes: Mutability有為 + change転変
row.jpn: この世のすべての存在や現象は常にうつろいやまないこと。また、この世が無常ではかないことのたとえ。

row.notes: Mutability有為 + not無 consistent常
row.jpn: この世のさまざまな現象は常に移り変わりはかないこと。

row.notes: Pleasant好 when sunny晴, and uncommonly奇 beautiful in the rain雨
row.jpn: 晴雨どちらでもすばらしいながめ。

row.notes: All manner of beings having有 form象 or lacking無 form象
row.jpn: 形があるものないものすべて。森羅万象。転じて、数は多いが種々雑多なつまらない人や物。

row.notes: Outside外 [the highest point of the formless realm>有頂天, i.e., in the highest possible emotional state
row.jpn: このうえもなく大喜びすること。

row.notes: Existence有 and nothingness無 occur生 together相
row.syn: 音声相和,高下相傾,前後相随
row.jpn: 有と無が相対的な関係で存在すること。

row.notes: Like clouds雲 coming together合 or mist霧 gathering集
row.jpn: 雲や霧が集まりわくように、多くのものが一時に集まりくろこと。

row.notes: Like clouds雲 dispersing散 or mist霧 vanishing消
row.jpn: 雲が散り消え霧が消えなくなるように、跡形もなく消えてなくなること。

row.notes: Like clouds雲 gathering集 and mist霧 dispersing散
row.jpn: たくさんのものが雲のようにむらがり集まったり、霧のようにたちまち散ったりすること。

row.notes: Great deeds eternally永 passed down垂 without不 decaying朽
row.jpn: 栄誉や業績などが長く後世に伝えられ、決して滅びないこと。

row.notes: Change易 name姓 and reform革 heaven's decree命 for a new bloodline of emperors. In this case, 革 is not 'leather' but 革(あら)める 'to reform.'
row.jpn: 王朝が交代すること。

row.english: Policy of adopting good relations with distant states while conquering nearby states
row.notes: If far遠, maintain good relations交. If near近, attack攻. The military policy of Fan Sui (范雎).
row.syn: 遠い国と仲良くし、近い国を挟み撃ちして攻める策。
row.jpn: 遠い国と仲良くし、近い国を挟み撃ちして攻める策。

row.english: Even a broken clock is right twice a day
row.notes: Even a lead鉛 sword刀 can get in one一 good slice割
row.jpn: 船で作った切れ味の悪い刀でも一度は物を断ち切ることができる。

row.notes: Seeking求 a fish魚 [by way of>縁 tree木. A futile endeavor using incorrect means to obtain the desired outcome.
row.syn: 縁木希魚,敲氷求火,縁山求魚
row.jpn: 不可能なことのたとえ。

row.notes: No不 [free time>暇 to respond応接 to all requests
row.jpn: 忙しくていちいち応じきれないこと。

row.english: Cleave the log according to the grain
row.notes: Give与 medicine薬 according応 to the illness病, i.e., teach according to the characteristics of the pupil.
row.syn: 応機接物,因機説法,善巧方便,対症下薬
row.jpn: 人や性格や理解力、状況に応じて適切な指導をすること。

row.english: ① A sumptuous feast ② Showering one with gifts and food
row.notes: Large大 dish盤 behavior振舞
row.jpn: 盛大なごちそう。また、気前よく物を与えたりごちそうしたりすること。

row.english: Know when to reward and when to punish
row.notes: Both kindness恩 and reprimand威 should be used [in tandem>並行 with servants
row.jpn: 人を使う場合には、適当な賞罰が必要だということ。

row.notes: Belching吐 sound音 clearly朗朗
row.jpn: 音声が豊かではっきりしているさま。

row.kun: 山(やま)を回(めぐ)らし、海(うみ)を倒(たお)す
row.notes: (NULL)
row.jpn: 非常に勢いが盛んなこと。

row.english: An emperor familiar enough with the goings-on of their domain that advisors cannot deceive them
row.notes: A kingdom that spreads 10,000万 miles里 as familiar as the stairs階 right before前 their throne
row.jpn: 天子が地方の政治の状況をよく知っていて、臣は天子を欺くことができないこと。

row.notes: A rare奇 man士 unlike any within内 the Four Seas海 (bodies of water that represented boundaries of ancient China)
row.jpn: この世に類のないほどすぐれた人物。

row.notes: Summer夏 clouds雲 taking the rare奇 shape of mountain peaks峰. Refers to a rare phenomenom seen in summertime clouds.
row.jpn: 夏の入道雲が大空につくるめずらしい峰の形のこと。

row.english: Diligent daily pursuit of an area of study
row.notes: 格致 is short for 格物致知, which means to maximize one's knowledge of a subject. 日新 is to gain new新 knowledge each day日
row.jpn: 物事の本質を追求して知識を高め、日々向上していくこと。

row.english: Pursuing knowledge and understanding of the true nature of things
row.notes: Striving for the ultimate格 true understanding of something物 and the pinnacle致 of knowledge知
row.jpn: 物事の本質をつきつめて理解し、知識を深めること。

row.english: The joy of receiving a letter from family
row.notes: A family家 letter書 is worth 10,000万 gold金
row.jpn: 家族からの手紙は、何よりもうれしいということ。

row.notes: As commonplace as a household's家 daily常 tea茶 and food飯. Usu 日常茶飯
row.jpn: ごくありふれたこと。

row.english: The flowers of Spring and moonlight of Autumn
row.notes: In springtime, flowers花 bloom in the morning朝 and in autumntime, the evening夕 moon月 is bright and beautiful
row.jpn: 春秋の季節の楽しもをいう。

row.notes: 活計 is extravagance, 歓楽 is joy and pleasure
row.jpn: ぜいたくをして気ままに楽しむこと。

row.notes: A house家 with only徒 four四 walls壁 and nothing inside
row.jpn: 非常に貧しいさま。

row.english: ① An impoverished home creates filially pious children ② In times of trouble, one's true character comes through
row.notes: A home家 that is poor貧 has a filially孝 pious child子
row.jpn: 家が貧しいと孝行な子供ができるということ。

row.kun: 天(テン)に歓(よろこ)び、地(チ)に喜(よろこ)ぶ
row.notes: Joy歓 to the heavens天, joy喜 to the earth地
row.jpn: 非常に喜ぶこと。

row.notes: (NULL)
row.jpn: 世俗を離れた風流な人の趣深いさま。

row.kun: 我(わ)が田に水(みず)を引(ひ)く
row.english: Each draws water to their own well
row.notes: Draw引 water水 into your own我 field田 unconcerned about the effect on others
row.jpn: 自分の都合のよいように、考えたり事を進めたりすること。

row.kun: 奇貨(きか)居(お)く可(べ)し
row.english: When an opportunity presents itself, take full advantage of it
row.notes: A rare奇 item貨 should可 be placed居 in storage to then sell later at great profit. Lu Buwei (呂不韋) was a great merchant of the Warring States period. He reasoned that working fields could barely earn a living. Selling precious gems was preferable, but the best return on investment comes from becoming a ruler who can pass status, wealth and land down through generations. Lu Buwei saw his opportunity in Yiren (異人), a prince who was hostage to the Zhao趙 state. Lu Buwei worked to return Yiren home where he succeeded his father as King Zhuangxiang (荘襄王) and appointed Lu Buwei chancellor.
row.jpn: 絶好の機会はうまく利用しなければならないというたとえ。

row.notes: Avoiding danger危機 by a single一 hair's髪 breadth
row.jpn: 非常に危ない瀬戸際。

row.notes: 旗鼓 is a military flag and drum representing the military. 堂堂 is having majestic presence.
row.jpn: 整然として威厳があること。

row.notes: 妙計 and 奇策 both mean a plan of exceptional craftsmanship that no ordinary person could make. Usu 妙計奇策
row.jpn: 人の意表をついた奇抜ですぐれたはかりごと。

row.english: Coming and going without warning; Popping up here and there unexpectedly
row.notes: Exiting出 like a spirit鬼 and entering入 like lightning電. Usually refers to a person moving freely.
row.jpn: 出入りが遠くて、出没が予測できないこと。

row.english: The trials and tribulations experienced by a noble living abroad
row.notes: One of noble貴 type種 wandering流離 in another country
row.jpn: 貴人が流離しつづける運命の中で苦難や恋を体験し帰国すること。

row.english: Uniquely original, eccentric and imaginative; Out of this world
row.notes: Like something of fantastical奇 imagination想 fallen from outside外 the bounds of the heavens天
row.jpn: 思いもよらないような奇抜なこと。

row.english: A fierce countenance hiding a gentle heart
row.notes: Face面 of demon鬼, heart心 of Buddha仏
row.jpn: 見た目は恐ろしそうだが、本当は心がとてもやさしいこと。

row.notes: Seeking求 a fish魚 by way of縁 tree木. A futile endeavor using incorrect means to obtain the desired outcome.
row.jpn: 不可能なことのたとえ。

row.english: Stuck in a rut; Stuck in the past
row.notes: Still依然 in an old旧 attitude態
row.jpn: 昔のままで少しも進歩しないこと。

row.english: The Eight Stages of Shooting in Japanese archery
row.notes: Ashibumi, Dozukuri, Yugamae, Uchiokoshi, Hikiwake, Kai, Hanare and Zanshin
row.jpn: 弓道での弓を射る八段階の方則のこと。

row.reading: きゅうねんめんぺき, くねんめんぺき
row.notes: Bodhidharma (達磨大師) sat facing面 the wall壁 of Shaolin Monastery (嵩山少林寺) and meditated for nine九 years年 and achieved enlightenment. Usu 面壁九年
row.jpn: 長年わきめもふらず勉学すること。

row.kun: 風(かぜ)を吸(す)い、露(つゆ)を飲(の)む
row.english: The simple life of a hermit
row.notes: Sucking吸 wind風 and drinking飲 dew露
row.jpn: 仙人などの清浄な生活のこと。

row.notes: Crazy狂 happy喜, wild乱 dance舞
row.jpn: 非常に喜ぶさま。

row.english: Enlightenment comes not from a book, but from the heart
row.notes: Enlightenment comes from outside外 teachings教, it's transmitted伝 to another別 through mind/heart/feeling.
row.jpn: 悟りは言葉や経典で伝えられるものではなく、心から心へと伝えるものだということ。

row.kun: 天(テン)を驚(おどろ)かし、地(チ)を動(うご)かす
row.notes: Shocks驚 the heavens天 and shakes動 the earth地
row.jpn: 世間をおおいに驚かせること。

row.notes: 紆余 is a winding path. 浮沈 is floating and sinking.
row.jpn: 事情が込み入り複雑なこと。

row.notes: Bending曲 the brush筆 and making the sentences文 dance舞
row.jpn: 事実を曲げて書き、いたずらに言辞をもてあそぶこと。

row.notes: 挙国 is all the people of a nation. 一致 is unified.
row.jpn: 国民が心を一つにして団結すること。

row.english: One whose speech and views help shape society
row.notes: Golden金 mouth口, wooden木 tongue舌, like the clapper of a bell
row.jpn: すぐれた言論で社会を指導する人のたとえ。

row.notes: Golden金 Dell谷 wine酒 count数. Shi Chong (石崇), a poet of the Western Jin (西晋) dynasty, enjoyed hosting poetry writings at his villa, the Golden Dell. Guests that couldn't complete a poem had to drink wine as a penalty.
row.jpn: 詩が作れない道に対して、罰として飲ませる酒のこと。

row.notes: Golden金 castle城 with iron鉄 walls壁
row.jpn: 非常に堅固で、つけこむすきがないこと。

row.notes: 近所 is neighborhood. 合壁 is walls that face each other.
row.jpn: 近所の家のこと。

row.english: A perfect balance of intelligence and virtue
row.notes: Refers to song structure in ancient China where it would start with the sound声 of a bell金 and end with the strike振 of a gong玉. A well-structured mind and upright character.
row.jpn: 才知と人徳を調和よく備えていること。

row.notes: A suspicious疑 mind心 sees demons鬼 in the dark暗
row.jpn: 疑いの心があると、なんでもないことにまで不安や恐怖を覚えるようになってしまうこと。

row.reading: くうくうじゃくじゃく
row.english: ① Free of obstructive thought ② Disinterest
row.notes: 空空 is the belief that everything that exists is empty and without true form. 寂寂 is quiet and still.
row.jpn: 無心なこと。また、無関心なこと。

row.notes: From Buddhist phrase: 色即是空、空即是色. Form色 therefore即 is是 emptiness空, emptiness空 therefore即 is是 form色. Nothing with physical form is permanent and therefore empty, but these transient things still exist in temporary physical forms.
row.jpn: 万物の本性は空だが、それがそのままこの世に実存する物の姿でもあるということ。

row.english: Three things which the purposed man guards against
row.notes: Lust for women, squabbles and greed
row.jpn: 君子が自戒すべき三つの戒め。

row.english: A purposed man lives a long life
row.notes: 君子 is learned man with purpose. 万年 is 10,000 years.
row.jpn: 徳の高い人は長寿であるということ。

row.notes: A gathering群 of heroes雄 divvying割 up lands positions拠
row.jpn: 多くの実力者が、互いに対立しあうこと。

row.notes: A beautiful美 woman女 that can topple傾 a nation国
row.jpn: 絶世の美人のこと。

row.notes: Light軽, thin薄, short短, small小
row.jpn: うすっぺらで中身のないさま。

row.english: Skilled at both military and literary arts
row.notes: Warp経 threads of literary文 arts, weft緯 threads of military武 forming a metaphorical fabric of skills
row.jpn: 文武の両道を兼ね備えていること。

row.notes: Ideas of [universal love>兼愛 and benevolence交利 promoted by Mozi (墨子) in the Warring State period
row.jpn: 区別なく広く愛し互いに利しあう。

row.notes: The hard堅 stone the white白 stone are the same同 yet different異. From a paradox posed by logician Gongsun Long (公孫竜). Looking at a stone, you can perceive its whiteness but not its hardness. Touching the stone, you can perceive its hardness but not its color. Therefore, the white stone and the hard stone are different entities within the same object.
row.jpn: こじつけ、詭弁のたとえ。

row.notes: Learning学問 where your know the titles題 on the outside外 covers, but haven't read what's within
row.jpn: うわべだけの学問。

row.english: The flippant and vulgar poetic style of the Tang period
row.notes: Su Shi (蘇軾) of the Song宋 dynasty wrote that poets Yuan Zhen (元稹) and Bai Juyi (白居) of the Tang唐 dynasty had a flippant軽 and vulgar俗 style
row.jpn: 唐の軽薄卑俗だということ。

row.english: Doing what you say; Actions matching one's words
row.notes: (NULL)
row.jpn: 口で言うことと実際に行うことが一致していること。

row.notes: 言笑 is lighthearted chat. 自若 is calm and carefree. Comes from a story about Guan Yu (関羽) in the Three Kingdoms periods. Guan Yu was shot in the elbow with a poison arrow in battle. At a dinner for the generals that night, a doctor came to treat him and cut open his elbow to let it bleed out. The whole time Guan Yu just laughed and ate and chatted like nothing was happening.
row.jpn: どのようなことがあっても平然としていることのたとえ。

row.notes: Current現 situation状 maintained維持
row.jpn: 現在の状態がそのままで変化しないこと。

row.english: A colloquial style of writing that matches spoken language
row.notes: Spoken言 and literary文 styles unified一致. Came into prominence during Meiji period as a simpler, easy-to-read writing style.
row.jpn: 話し言葉と書き言葉を一致させて文章を書くこと。

row.notes: Fragrance香 surrounding囲, white powder粉 makeup lined陣 up in every direction
row.jpn: 多くの美人にとりかこまれるたとえ。

row.notes: A thick厚 face顔 (the red of embarrassment doesn't show through) and no無 shame恥.
row.jpn: あつかましくて、恥知らずなさま。

row.notes: A favorable好 opportunity機 arrives到来
row.jpn: ちょうどよい機会がくること。

row.notes: 光彩 is beautiful light. 陸離 is shining in all directions.
row.jpn: 美しい光が、まばゆいばかりに輝くさま。

row.english: A little learning is a dangerous thing
row.notes: 口耳 is going directly from ear to mouth. 講説 is providing a lesson or explanation. Illustrates one who hears knowledge and then immediately speaks about it to others despite limited understanding.
row.jpn: 聞いたことをよく消化しないで、すぐにそのまま人に話すこと。

row.notes: The occassion機縁 of ascension向上
row.jpn: 昇天の機会のこと。

row.kun: 城(しろ)を攻(せ)め、野原(のはら)で戦(たたか)う
row.english: Battling in the fields during a castle raid
row.notes: Attack攻 castle城, field野 battle戦
row.jpn: 城を攻め野原で戦うこと。

row.notes: Public公 order序 and good良 custom俗
row.jpn: 公共の秩序と善良な風俗・習慣のこと。

row.english: A little learning is a dangerous thing
row.notes: Between mouth口 and ear耳 there is but 4四 inches寸. 寸 is a unit of length representing a short distance. Illustrates one who hears knowledge and then immediately imparts it to others despite limited understanding.
row.jpn: 聞きかじりの学問。

row.notes: 高談 is vigorous discussion. 雄弁 is a forceful and persuasive argument.
row.jpn: 声高に談論すること。また、とうとうと議論すること。

row.english: ① Immediately retracting what you said ② Random speech
row.notes: Orpiment雌黄 in中 the mouth口. Orpiment is an orange-yellow arsenic sulfide used like Wite-Out to erase writing errors back when paper was a more yellowish color. Basically, there is no consistency or integrity to what you say.
row.jpn: 一度口にしたことをすぐ取り消し訂正するたとえ。転じて、でまかせをいうこと。

row.notes: Joining交 heads頭 and touching接 ears耳
row.jpn: ひそひそ話のこと。

row.english: Hordes of people coming and going
row.notes: People gazing望 at [each other's>相 heads項 and backs背 as they slowly shuffle forward
row.jpn: 人の往来がはげしいことの形容。

row.reading: こくしゅうきゅうけん
row.on: コクシュウキュウケン
row.kun: 舟(ふね)に刻(きざ)みて剣(ケン)を求(もと)む
row.english: Being stuck in the past; Unable to let go of outdated thinking/customs
row.notes: Carve刻 the boat舟 and seek求 the sword剣. From the Spring and Autumn period. There once was a man of the Chu楚 nation who was crossing a large river on a boat. Midway across, he dropped his sword into the river. Quickly, the man carved a mark on the deck of the ship and said, "There! Now I know I dropped my sword at exactly this spot!" The ship continued along and eventually reached the dock and came to a stop. Now the man was ready to retrieve his sword. He found the mark he had made on the ship and dove into the water right from that spot. However, while the ship had continued to move a fair distance, the sword sunk straight down and hadn't budged. The silliness of this situation illustrates the foolishness of stubborn adherence to outdated thinking and customs.
row.jpn: 時勢の推移を知らず、古い考えや習慣を固守する愚かさのたとえ。

row.notes: Country's国 most beautiful color色, heaven天-sent aroma香
row.jpn: すばらしい香りと国一番の美しさ。牡丹の別名。

row.notes: The time刻 when mountains appear露 prominently across the landscape and the skies are clear清 and beautiful秀
row.jpn: すがすがしい秋の景色のたとえ。

row.english: Realizing the error of your ways and pledging to be better
row.notes: Now今 my actions will be correct是, but until yesterday昨 they were wrong非
row.jpn: 今になって過去のあやまちに気づくこと。

row.notes: Ultimate極 evil悪 without非 morals道
row.jpn: このうえなく悪くて、動議にはずれていること。

row.english: ① Being reborn in the Pure Land ② Passing on to the next life
row.notes: In the [Pure Land>極楽浄土, go往 and be reborn生
row.jpn: この世を去ってのち、極楽浄土に生まれかわること。また、安らかに死ぬこと。

row.english: Completely lost; Having no clue what to do
row.notes: In the middle中 of thick fog霧 that spread for five五 ri里 in every direction. 里 is a unit of distance often used in sayings in a similar way as mile. From a story about Zhang Kai (張楷), of the Later Han漢 period, who could use Taoist magic to conjure up mist to evade people and maintain his perferred life as a hermit.
row.jpn: 物事の手がかりがつかめずとまどうこと。

row.english: ① Three companions you want in times of adversity: pine, bamboo and plum ② Wintertime, times of adversity
row.notes: During times歳 of cold寒 (winter/adversity), the three三 friends友 you should have: pine and bamboo (they don't wilt in the winter) and plum (to make good alcohol)
row.jpn: 冬に友とすべき三つの植物、松と竹と梅。

row.notes: Years歳 and months月 don't不 wait待
row.jpn: 年月はすみやかに過ぎさり、人の都合などを待ってはくれないということ。

row.english: A woman of beauty and talent
row.notes: Talent才 and allure色 both兼 equipped備
row.jpn: 女性がすぐれた才能と美しい容姿の両方に恵まれていること。

row.notes: Worship祭 of deities and governement政 unified一致
row.jpn: 神を祭ることと政治は一体であるという考え。

row.english: Realizing the error of your ways and pledging to be better
row.notes: Now今 my actions will be correct是, but until yesterday昨 they were wrong非. Usu 今是昨非
row.jpn: 今になって過去のあやまちに気づくこと。

row.notes: Shan Jian (山簡) loads載 the cart with alcohol until its tipping倒 over.
row.jpn: 大酒飲みのたとえ。

row.notes: Three三 army軍 units (12,500 people each), left exposed暴 as bones骨 on the battlefield.
row.jpn: 戦いに大敗すること。

row.notes: Purple紫 mountains山 and pristine明 waters水
row.jpn: 自然の景観が清らかで美しいこと。

row.english: Showing deference to a superior opponent
row.notes: Avoiding避 the enemy by withdrawing退 to three三 [day's worth of travel>舎 of distance away. Here, 舎 refers to day's worth of travel for an army unit. From the Spring and Autumn period. Chong'er (重耳) of Jin晋 had sought refuge in the state of Chu楚 where he was treated well. In thanks, he promised that should the armies of Jin and Chu meet on the battlefiled, he would show deference and retreat three [day's worth of journey>舎 apart.
row.jpn: 相手にとてもかなわないと思って遠慮する、恐れ避けること。

row.english: Living away from society as a hermit
row.notes: In中 the mountains山 there is no calendar暦日 because you forget the days.
row.jpn: 俗世を離れて悠々と暮らすこと。

row.notes: Give three三 orders命令 and five五 proclamations申
row.jpn: くどくどと言い聞かすこと。

row.notes: When an accomplished soldier retired of old age, the Emperor would send three三 elders老 and five五 messengers便 to express appreciation.
row.jpn: 徳の高い長老。

row.kun: 子(こ)は父(ちち)の為(ため)に隠(かく)す
row.english: Father and son looking out for each other
row.notes: The child子, for the sake為 of the father父, hides隠 his faults. Opposite idiom 父為子隠 also exists.
row.jpn: お互いに悪いところがあってもそれを隠し、かばいあうことが父と子の正しい道であるということ。

row.notes: Within the bounds of the four四 seas海 (the entire world), we are all brothers兄弟.
row.jpn: 世界中の人々はみな兄弟のように仲良くすべきだということ。

row.notes: Dead死 ashes灰 again復 burning然(燃)
row.jpn: 一度衰えた勢力が再び盛り返すこと。

row.notes: From Buddhist phrase: 色即是空、空即是色. Form色 therefore即 is是 emptiness空, emptiness空 therefore即 is是 form色. Nothing with physical form is permanent and therefore empty, but these transient things still exist in temporary physical forms.
row.jpn: 万物の本質は空である。

row.notes: Four四 arid荒 lands occupied for foreign tribes, eight八 ends極 of the earth.
row.jpn: 世界中のあらゆる地域のこと。世界のすみずみ。

row.notes: Four四 Books書: Great Learning (大学), Doctrine of the Mean (中庸), Analects (論語) and Mencius (孟子). The Five五 Classics経: Classic of Poetry (詩経), Book of Documents (書経), Book of Rites (礼記), I Ching (易経) and Spring and Autumn Annals (春秋).
row.jpn: 聖人や賢人の言行や教えなどを記した儒教の聖典。

row.notes: From Confucian Analects: "At 40四十, I had no不 doubts惑."
row.jpn: 四十歳であれこれ迷わくなること。

row.english: Sticking to your morals and principles
row.notes: 志操 is one's principles. 堅固 is hard and firm.
row.jpn: 主義や考えなどを堅く守って変えないこと。

row.notes: 詩腸 is your poetry-writing gut (emotion, sense). 鼓吹 is drumming and flute-playing representing encouragement to stir up your emotions. Daiyong (戴顒) of Song宋 went out one Spring morning to cleanse his ears with the chirping of nightingales and stir up his poetic emotions.
row.jpn: 詩を作る情をかきたてるうぐいすの声をいう。

row.english: Tragic separation of parent and child
row.notes: Four四 bird鳥 separation別離. One morning, Confucius heard a cry of great sadness. Gan Hui (顔回) said a mother bird nearby had just said goodbye to her four chicks leaving the nest.
row.jpn: 親と子の悲しい別れのこと。

row.notes: Losing失 composure to laughter笑 and spitting噴 out your mean飯
row.jpn: あまりのおかしさを押さえきれずに、食べている飯を吹き出して笑ってしまうこと。

row.notes: Seven七 rarities珍 and multitude万 of treasures宝. In Buddhism, the seven rarities are gold (金), silver (銀), lapis lazuli (瑠璃), giant clam shell (硨磲), agate (瑪瑙), quartz (玻璃) and coral (珊瑚), but this can vary based on reference text.
row.jpn: 多くの宝物のこと。

row.english: If you focus hard enough and want it strongly enough, you can achieve anything
row.notes: Shoot射 a stone石 and it swallows飲 the arrow up to the fletching羽. One night, Xiong Liangzhi (熊渠子) was traveling by horse and suddenly spotted a tiger sitting in the darkness by the side of the road. Slowly, he placed an arrow on his bow and drew it back with all his might. The arrow struck the tiger, but the animal didn't move an inch. Xiong dismounted and went to check on the tiger, but what he thought was a tiger was just an ordinary stone. Even more shocking, the arrow he fired had penetrated the stone down to the fletching. Amazed, Xiong fired another arrow at the stone, only to have it shatter upon impact, leaving not even a mark where it struck.
row.jpn: 精神を集中して必死の思いで事にのぞめば、どんな困難なことでもできるということ。

row.reading: しゅうがいけいちゅう
row.english: A lovely figure and kind heart
row.notes: Usually refers to a woman. Superb秀 outside外 and merciful恵 inside中.
row.jpn: 容姿が美しく心もやさしいこと。また、外見が立派で心もさといこと。

row.notes: Many衆 mouths口 unified一致
row.jpn: 全員の言うことがぴったり合うこと。

row.notes: 離 are 散 separating. 合 and 集 are coming together.
row.jpn: 離れたり集まったりすること。また、協力したり反目したりすること。

row.reading: しゅうちゅうてきこく
row.english: Today's ally may be tomorrow's enemy
row.notes: The enemy敵 country国 exists in中 in the boat舟. A warning to government that enemies can grow domestically as well.
row.jpn: 自分の味方だと思っていた側近や親近者がそむき離れるたとえ。

row.reading: しゅかくてんとう, しゅきゃくてんとう
row.notes: The roles of master主 and guest客 flipped転倒
row.jpn: 物事の順序・立場・重要度などが逆転すること。

row.english: A warm smile hiding a sinister motive
row.notes: Hiding蔵 a sword刀 behind裏 a smile笑
row.jpn: 外見はおだやかでやさしそうでありながら、内心は陰険なものをもつこと。

row.notes: 新進=newly appeared; 気鋭=gaining enthusiasm
row.jpn: ある分野に新しく登場し、意気込みが盛んで将来性があること。

row.notes: Self自己 contradiction矛盾. During the Warring State period, a merchant of Chu楚 was attempting to sell a spear and shield. He claimed the spear was sharp enough to pierce anything, and the shield was solid enough to block anything. When asked, "What if you strike the shield with the spear?" he had no answer.
row.jpn: 同一人物の考えや行動が前後でつじつまが会わなくなること。

row.notes: 耳熟 is full-matured ears, having listened to much on the subject. 能詳 is having complete capability.
row.jpn: 何度も聞きなれていることは、詳しく説明することができるということ。また、物事を知りつくしていること。

row.english: 'Strenous efforts, unless sustained, are to no avail' - Mencius (孟子)
row.notes: Many an effort starts with one一 day of warmth暴 (action) followed by 10十 days of cold寒 (inaction)
row.jpn: 努力が少なく怠ることが多いのを戒めた語。

row.notes: Using true実 things事 to seek求 truth是
row.jpn: 事実の実証にもとづいて物事の真理を追求すること。

row.notes: 耳提 is pulling down one's earlobe to speak directly into the ear. 面命 is facing someone directly and explaining to them. Usu 提耳面命.
row.jpn: 懇切に教え諭すことのたとえ。

row.notes: 縦 and 横 can both be read ほしいまま, meaning do as you please. 無尽 is inexhaustibility.
row.jpn: 自由自在に振る舞うさま。また、思う存分振る舞うさま。

row.reading: じゅうこうちょうだい
row.english: Massive and soild; Large and bulky
row.notes: Heavy重 thick厚 long長 and big大
row.jpn: どっしりとして大きいさま。

row.english: Training a skill many years and awaiting the chance to showcase it
row.notes: Ten十 years年 of training with a single一 sword剣
row.jpn: 長年武芸の修養をつんで、力を発揮する機会を待つこと。

row.notes: 熟思 is to think over thoroughly. 黙想 is to quietly ruminate.
row.jpn: 物事を沈黙してじっくりと考えること。

row.english: Taking decisive action after careful thought
row.notes: 熟慮 is to carefully ruminate. 断行 is to take decisive action.
row.jpn: よくよく考えたうえで、思いきって実行すること。

row.notes: Pleasant好 when sunny晴, and uncommonly奇 beautiful in the rain雨
row.jpn: 晴雨どちらでもすばらしいながめ。

row.notes: Customers客 coming来 by the thousands千 and ten-thousands万
row.jpn: (NULL)

row.notes: 千・万=a great amount; 変・化=change
row.jpn: さまざまに変化すること。

row.english: Men and women who follow the teachings of Buddhism
row.notes: Virtuous善 men男, virtuous善 women女
row.jpn: 仏教を信仰する人々。

row.notes: 創意=creativity; 工夫=ingenuity
row.jpn: 新しいことを考え出し、いろいろ手段をめぐらすこと。

row.english: The true nature of something cannot be conveyed in words
row.notes: The person者 who knows知 does not不 speak言
row.jpn: 物事をほんとうに知っているものは言わないものだ。

row.notes: Working行 all day昼 and兼 night夜
row.jpn: 昼と夜の区別なく続けて物事を行うこと。

row.notes: An law令 is made in the morning朝 and by night暮, it's already revised改
row.jpn: 命令や法令がすぐに変わって定まらないこと

row.notes: 提耳 is pulling down one's earlobe to speak directly into the ear. 面命 is facing someone directly and explaining to them.
row.jpn: 懇切に教え諭すことのたとえ。

row.notes: Same同 bed床, different異 dreams夢
row.jpn: (NULL)

row.notes: As commonplace as daily日常 tea茶 and food飯
row.jpn: ごくありふれたこと。

row.english: ① A 3-legged race ② A team effort
row.notes: Two二 people人 tied together to make three三 legs脚
row.jpn: 二人が互いに助け合って事に当たること。

row.english: Face of man, heart of beast
row.notes: Face面 of man人, heart心 of beast獣
row.jpn: 冷酷で義理人情をわきまえない人のこと。

row.notes: White白 sands砂 and green青 pines松
row.jpn: 美しい海岸の景色のこと。

row.notes: 10,000万 ways to die死 and you find the one一 way to live生
row.jpn: 必死の覚悟で物事を行うこと。また、絶体絶命の状況のなかに、かすかな活路をみつけること。

row.english: Like water off a duck's back; Paying no heed to opinions or criticism of others
row.notes: Words breeze right past like a horse's馬 ear耳 caressed by a gentle eastern東 breeze風
row.jpn: 人の意見や批評を心にとめず聞き流すこと。また、何を言っても反応がないこと。

row.english: A group of thugs and troublemakers
row.notes: 100百 demons鬼 marching行 through the night夜
row.jpn: 多くの悪人がのさばりはびこるたとえ。

row.notes: Beautiful美・麗 prose辞・句
row.jpn: 巧みに飾り立てた美しい言葉。また、うわべだけを飾り立てた内容のない言葉。

row.notes: Beautiful美 people人 have misfortune薄命 in store
row.jpn: 美しい女性は、とかく不運で短命である。

row.kun: 父(ちち)は子(こ)の為(ため)に隠(かく)す
row.english: Father and son looking out for each other
row.notes: The father父, for the sake為 of the child子, hides隠 his faults. Opposite idiom 子為父隠 also exists.
row.jpn: お互いに悪いところがあってもそれを隠し、かばいあうことが父と子の正しい道であるということ。

row.english: Putting the cart before the horse
row.notes: Flipping転倒 the main本 part and the end末
row.jpn: 物事の大事なこととそうでないことを逆にすること。

row.notes: 妙計 and 奇策 both mean a plan of exceptional craftsmanship that no ordinary person could make
row.jpn: 人の意表をついた奇抜ですぐれたはかりごと。

row.notes: Obsessed夢中 to the point where you lose無 oneself我
row.jpn: あることに没頭して自分を忘れること。また、何かに熱中するあまり、他のことを気にかけないこと。

row.notes: Bodhidharma (達磨大師) sat facing面 the wall壁 of Shaolin Monastery (嵩山少林寺) and meditated for 9九 years年 and achieved enlightenment
row.jpn: 長年わきめもふらず勉学すること。

row.notes: Too meek優 and soft柔; 不断=unable to decide
row.jpn: いつまでもぐずぐずして物事の決断ができないこと。

row.english: Tying up all the loose ends
row.notes: 用意=preparation; 周到=thoroughness
row.jpn: 心づかいがゆきとどいて、準備に手ぬかりのないさま。

row.notes: 離・散=parting; 合・集=coming together
row.jpn: 離れたり集まったりすること。また、協力したり反目したりすること。
